SheetLabels.Actor: The Weight of Ruin Actor Sheet
SheetLabels.Character: The Weight of Ruin Player Character Sheet
SheetLabels.NPC: The Weight of Ruin NPC Sheet
SheetLabels.Loot: The Weight of Ruin Loot Sheet
SheetLabels.Item: The Weight of Ruin Item Sheet

Talent.SubtypeHint: For signature talents, specify the calling (e.g., Paladin)

Calling.Title: Calling
Calling.FocusPlaceholder: What does this calling specialize in?

Background.Title: Background
Background.ContactPlaceholder: e.g., Trade partner or ship captain

Magic.NoWitchsight: This character lacks Witchsight and cannot use magic.
Magic.InsufficientWitchsight: Requires Witchsight {required}, but character only has {current}.
Magic.InsufficientTechnique: Requires {technique} rank {required}, but character only has {current}.
Magic.InsufficientForm: Requires {form} rank {required}, but character only has {current}.
Magic.InsufficientRitefocus: Requires Ritefocus rank {required}, but character only has {current}.
Magic.InsufficientEssence: Requires {required} Essence, but character only has {current}.
Magic.BloodCost: Blood magic deals {amount} Trauma to the caster.

Health.WoundsRollRequired: {name} is at Breaking Point and must make a Wounds Roll!
Health.WoundsRollPrompt: {name} is at Breaking Point. Roll Wounds to endure.
Health.WoundsRollInfo: Roll your Wounds pool at Standard difficulty. You need 1 hit to pass. Failure costs 1 Wound and reduces Max Trauma by 2.
Health.StabilizedNoRoll: {name} is stabilized and does not need to make a Wounds Roll.

Essence.label: Essence
Essence.LowWarning: Essence is dangerously low! Corruption threatens to consume you.
Essence.LengWarning: Essence depleted! The transformation into a Leng creature has begun.
Essence.DecreaseWarning: Are you sure you want to reduce Essence from {current} to {new}? Essence loss is significant and difficult to recover.
Essence.CorruptionSignPrompt: Add a corruption sign to your character.
Essence.CorruptionSignMessage: {name}'s Essence has dropped to {threshold}. As the soul degrades, corruption manifests physically.
Essence.CorruptionSignPlaceholder: e.g., Veins darken beneath the skin...
Essence.LengWarningMessage: {name}'s Essence has reached zero. The transformation into a Leng creature has begun.
Essence.LengConsequence: This character is no longer playable as a mortal. They have become something... else.

Zeal.Title: Zeal
Zeal.RerollEffect: Rerolled the dice, taking the better result
Zeal.BonusDiceEffect: Added 3 bonus dice to the pool
Zeal.ZeroPoolEffect: Rolled 1d6 at Hard difficulty for zero pool
Zeal.RerollPrompt: Would you like to spend 2 Zeal to reroll?

Fervor.Title: Fervor
Fervor.RerollEffect: Rerolled the dice, taking the better result
Fervor.BonusDiceEffect: Added 3 bonus dice to the pool
Fervor.ZeroPoolEffect: Rolled 1d6 at Hard difficulty for zero pool
Fervor.RerollPrompt: Would you like to spend 2 Fervor to reroll?

Rest.Title: Rest
Rest.ComfortableHint: Resting in a safe, comfortable environment (inn, home, good camp)
Rest.RestResult: {name} rested for {hours} hours and recovered {trauma} Trauma.
Rest.RestResultComfortable: {name} rested comfortably for {hours} hours and recovered {trauma} Trauma (including +1 for comfortable rest).
Rest.NoTraumaToRecover: {name} rested but had no Trauma to recover.
Rest.MaxRecovery: Maximum recovery per full night is 4 Trauma.
Rest.RecoveryRate: Recovery: 1 Trauma per 2 hours of rest

Passions.Title: Passions
Passions.NatureHint: How do you act under pressure?

Wealth.EditDescription: Enter the amount to add, subtract, or set for each currency.

Wizard.Title: Character Advancement
Wizard.AttributeDescription: Choose one attribute to increase by +1.
Wizard.SkillsDescription: Choose three skills to increase by +1 rank each.
Wizard.TalentDescription: Advance an existing talent or purchase a new one.

Roll.Title: Roll
Roll.TTHint: Leave blank for simple success/fail check
Roll.ZeroPoolWarning: Pool is 0 - automatic failure without Fervor
Roll.ZeroPoolInfo: Spend 1 Fervor to roll 1d6 at Hard difficulty
Roll.ZeroPoolCannotAttempt: Not enough Fervor to attempt zero pool roll
Roll.WoundsFailedConsequences: Lost 1 Wound and Max Trauma reduced by 2
Roll.ClickToRoll: Click to roll (Shift+Click for quick roll)

Combat.NoPermission: You do not have permission to modify this actor
Combat.EquipWeaponsHint: Equip weapons from the Inventory tab to use them here.

Defense.Label: Defense
Defense.Title: Defense Roll

BuyOption.Label: Defense Option
BuyOption.Hint: Each buy adds -2 penalty to ALL options this turn.

Defense.BuyAlreadyUsed: Defense option already used this turn

FullDefense.Title: Full Defense
FullDefense.ChatMessage: Spends all actions to gain +{bonus} to all defense rolls until next turn.
FullDefense.NoCombat: Full Defense can only be activated during combat.
FullDefense.NotInCombat: Actor is not in the current combat.

Skills.ShowAllHint: Toggle to show skills with rank 0

Concealable.label: Concealable
Concealable.Desc: +2 dice to hide weapon from searches

Finesse.label: Finesse
Finesse.Desc: May use Agility for attack/damage; +1 die when using Agility

Light.label: Light
Light.Desc: Can dual-wield; can use with Agility

Loading.label: Loading
Loading.Desc: Requires 1 Action to reload after firing

Reach.label: Reach
Reach.Desc: Strike targets 2 spaces away; cannot attack adjacent

Thrown.label: Thrown
Thrown.Desc: Can be thrown; range specified in parentheses

Trip.label: Trip
Trip.Desc: On hit, may attempt to knock target Prone (free action, opposed Agility)

Versatile.label: Versatile
Versatile.Desc: One or two hands; +1 damage when two-handed

Wounding.label: Wounding
Wounding.Desc: On critical hit, target gains Bleeding condition

Balanced.label: Balanced
Balanced.Desc: Well-balanced weapon with no specific bonus

Precise.label: Precise
Precise.Desc: Accurate weapon suited for precise strikes

Encumbering.label: Encumbering
Encumbering.Desc: -1 die to Agility-based physical skills per level (Acrobatics, Stealth, Swimming)

Bulky.label: Bulky
Bulky.Desc: Cannot be concealed under normal clothing

Spell.NoTargetsSelected: No targets selected. Select targets before applying effect.

Equipment.ArmorAlreadyEquipped: You already have armor equipped. You can only wear one armor piece at a time.
Equipment.ArmorCategoryAlreadyEquipped: You already have a {category} equipped. You can only wear one {category} at a time.
Equipment.NotEnoughHands: You don't have enough free hands to equip this weapon ({hands} hands required).
Equipment.SwitchQuestion: Would you like to switch your equipment?

Empty.Traits: No traits assigned. Use the NPC Creation Wizard to add traits.

NPC.LootHint: What can be found on this NPC...

Class.Label: Class
Class.HumanoidDesc: Intelligent bipedal creatures including humans and other civilized races
Class.BeastDesc: Natural animals and creatures of the wild
Class.VerminDesc: Insects, arachnids, and other crawling horrors
Class.AfflictedDesc: Cursed beings, undead, and those touched by dark powers
Class.FiendDesc: Demons, devils, and creatures from the hells

NPCTrait.Title: NPC Trait
NPCTrait.TypeSpecificHint: Comma-separated list of specific types (e.g., Wolf, Dire Wolf)

Loot.ToggleMode: Toggle between Loot and Merchant mode
Loot.NoTokensSelected: No tokens selected. Select NPC or creature tokens first.
Loot.SelectRecipientsHint: Check the characters who should receive a share.
Loot.SelectTokensHint: Check the tokens to loot items from.
Loot.DragItemsHint: Drag items here to add them.
Loot.InvalidItemType: Only weapons, armor, and gear can be added to loot.
Loot.NoBuyerSelected: No character selected. Assign a character to your user to purchase items.
Loot.NoCharacterSelected: No character selected. Assign a character to your user to take items.
Loot.NoGMOnline: No GM is online to process this request.
Loot.PurchaseConfirm: Purchase {item} for {price} Orin? This will be deducted from {buyer}'s wealth.

Confirm.DeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

Warnings.NoActorForRoll: This item must be owned by an actor to roll.
Warnings.SkillRequiresWitchsight: This skill requires Witchsight to use.
Warnings.MagicRequiresWitchsight: Cannot add magic items - character lacks Witchsight.
Warnings.CreationItemAfterComplete: Cannot add creation items after character creation is complete.
Warnings.LengTransformation: {name} has transformed into a Leng creature!
Warnings.TalentMaxRank: This talent is already at maximum rank.
Warnings.NotUnconscious: Cannot stabilize - character is not unconscious.
Warnings.InsufficientWounds: Cannot revive - wounds too low. Restore wounds first.
Warnings.StillAtBreakingPoint: Cannot revive - still at Breaking Point. Reduce trauma below Max Trauma first.
Warnings.GMOnly: This action can only be performed by the GM.

Bleeding.label: Bleeding
Bleeding.Desc: Open wounds cause ongoing blood loss. Takes 1 Trauma at end of turn.

Blinded.label: Blinded
Blinded.Desc: Cannot see. -4 dice to all rolls requiring sight and -4 Defense.

Burning.label: Burning
Burning.Desc: Engulfed in flames. Takes 1 Trauma at end of turn, can spread to adjacent targets.

Charmed.label: Charmed
Charmed.Desc: Considers the source friendly. Cannot attack the source.

Deafened.label: Deafened
Deafened.Desc: Cannot hear. -4 to hearing-based Awareness checks.

Defenseless.label: Defenseless
Defenseless.Desc: Unable to defend. Attacks against this target use Trivial difficulty.

Exhausted.label: Exhausted
Exhausted.Desc: Severely worn down. -2 dice to physical rolls, halved movement.

Flanked.label: Flanked
Flanked.Desc: Surrounded by enemies. Attackers gain +2 dice against this target.

Frightened.label: Frightened
Frightened.Desc: Terrified of the source. -2 dice to all rolls while source is visible, must move away.

Grappled.label: Grappled
Grappled.Desc: Held by an opponent. Movement is 0, -2 dice to attacks.

Hidden.label: Hidden
Hidden.Desc: Concealed from enemies. +2 dice on attacks from hiding (lost after attacking).

Poisoned.label: Poisoned
Poisoned.Desc: Toxic substance affecting the body. -2 dice to all rolls, takes 1 Trauma at end of turn.

Prone.label: Prone
Prone.Desc: Lying on the ground. -4 Defense vs melee, +2 Defense vs ranged. Costs 1 action to stand.

Restrained.label: Restrained
Restrained.Desc: Movement is 0, -4 Defense, -4 dice to attacks.

Stunned.label: Stunned
Stunned.Desc: Dazed and sluggish. Lose 1 action, -2 Defense.

Unconscious.label: Unconscious
Unconscious.Desc: Completely incapacitated. Cannot act, automatically Defenseless and Prone.

Dying.label: Dying
Dying.Desc: Near death. Cannot act, requires medical attention or death saves.

Dead.label: Dead
Dead.Desc: No longer living. Can only be removed by GM.

Staggered.label: Staggered
Staggered.Desc: Reeling from a powerful blow. Lose 1 action this turn.

Slowed.label: Slowed
Slowed.Desc: Movement impaired. Movement speed is halved.

Weakened.label: Weakened
Weakened.Desc: Strength sapped. -2 dice to attack rolls.

Wounded.label: Wounded
Wounded.Desc: Seriously injured. -2 dice to all rolls until healed.

Shaken.label: Shaken
Shaken.Desc: Rattled and uncertain. -2 dice to all rolls.

Numb.label: Numb
Numb.Desc: Feeling deadened. Cannot be healed, but immune to pain effects.

Marked.label: Marked
Marked.Desc: Designated target. Attackers gain +2 dice against this target.

Tethered.label: Tethered
Tethered.Desc: Bound to a location. Cannot move beyond anchor range.

Condition.ReferenceSubtitle: Quick reference for all conditions and their effects

Flag.EndOfTurnDamage: Takes {value} Trauma at end of turn
Flag.SocialAdvantage: Source has advantage on social rolls
Flag.AttacksAreTrivial: Attacks against this target use Trivial difficulty
Flag.AnchorRange: Cannot move beyond {value} spaces from anchor

Recovery.TreatmentReceived: {name} has received treatment and recovered {traumaHealed} Trauma.
Recovery.LongTermResult: {name} completed a week of bed rest. Restored {resilienceRestored} Wounds and {maxTraumaRestored} Max Trauma.

CharacterCreation.Title: Character Creation
CharacterCreation.RollAlreadyCommitted: You have already committed to a rolled result.
CharacterCreation.MaxLifeEvents: You have already drawn the maximum number of life events.
CharacterCreation.PendingEventExists: You must accept or reject the current event first.
CharacterCreation.NoEventsAvailable: No life events available in the compendium.
CharacterCreation.InsufficientWealth: Not enough wealth to purchase this item.
CharacterCreation.SkillCapReached: Starting skill rank cap (6) reached. Skills can be advanced beyond 6 after character creation.
CharacterCreation.StepIncomplete: Please complete the current step before continuing.
CharacterCreation.LineageDescription: Your lineage determines your character's heritage, physical traits, and innate abilities.
CharacterCreation.BackgroundDescription: Your background represents your social origins and early life.
CharacterCreation.ArchetypeDescription: Your archetype defines your character's role and combat style.
CharacterCreation.PathwayDescription: Your pathway represents your character's training and life path before becoming an adventurer.
CharacterCreation.BackgroundDescription: Your background represents your social origins and early life circumstances.
CharacterCreation.LifeEventsDescription: Draw up to 3 Life Events from the Deck of Life. Each accepted event adds depth to your character.
CharacterCreation.AttributesDescription: Distribute your attribute points to define your character's physical and mental capabilities.
CharacterCreation.FlexibleBonusDescription: Your lineage grants +1 to an attribute of your choice.
CharacterCreation.SkillsDescription: Allocate your free skill ranks to define your character's abilities.
CharacterCreation.TalentsDescription: Purchase talents with LP to give your character unique abilities and specializations.
CharacterCreation.DerivedDescription: These attributes are calculated from your base attributes.
CharacterCreation.PassionsDescription: Passions drive your character and fuel the Fervor resource.
CharacterCreation.NatureHint: How do you act under pressure?
CharacterCreation.MotivationHelp: What do you want to achieve? What goal or desire pushes you to act?
CharacterCreation.NatureHelp: What is your instinctual response to crisis? Bold? Cautious? Compassionate?
CharacterCreation.AllegianceHelp: Who or what commands your loyalty? A person, organization, ideal, or cause?
CharacterCreation.FervorInfo: Fervor is earned by acting on your Passions in meaningful, risky ways. Maximum 5 Fervor.
CharacterCreation.FinalizeDescription: Review your character and complete creation.
CharacterCreation.RollWealthFirst: Roll your starting wealth in the Legacy tab first.
CharacterCreation.SelectBackgroundFirst: Select a background first to roll starting wealth.
CharacterCreation.NoIncompleteCharacter: You don't have a character to create. Ask your GM to create a character for you first.

Lineage.Title: Choose Your Lineage
Lineage.Description: Your lineage determines your character's heritage, physical traits, and innate abilities.
Lineage.RollPrompt: Roll 3d6 for a random lineage (+25 LP)

Background.Title: Choose Your Background
Background.Description: Your background represents your character's social origins and early life circumstances.
Background.RollPrompt: Roll d100 for standing, then roll for background (+50 LP)

Archetype.Title: Choose Your Archetype
Archetype.Description: Your archetype defines your character's role and combat style.
Archetype.RollPrompt: Roll 1d6 for a random archetype (+25 LP)

Pathway.Title: Choose Your Pathway
Pathway.Description: Your pathway represents your character's training and life path before becoming an adventurer.
Pathway.RollPrompt: Roll 1d6 for a random pathway (+25 LP)

LifeEvents.Title: Life Events
LifeEvents.Description: Draw up to 3 Life Events from the Deck of Life. Each accepted event adds depth to your character.

Attributes.Title: Allocate Attributes
Attributes.Description: Distribute your attribute points to define your character's physical and mental capabilities.
Attributes.FlexibleBonusDescription: Your lineage grants +1 to an attribute of your choice.

SkillsTalents.Title: Skills & Talents
SkillsTalents.Description: Spend your free skill ranks and purchase talents with LP.

DerivedAttributes.Title: Derived Attributes
DerivedAttributes.Description: These attributes are calculated from your base attributes and represent your character's combat capabilities.

Passions.Title: Define Your Passions
Passions.Description: Passions drive your character and fuel the Zeal resource. Define three passions that shape who your character is.
Passions.MotivationHint: What do you want to achieve? What drives you forward?
Passions.MotivationPlaceholder: e.g., Protect the innocent, Seek forbidden knowledge, Reclaim my family's honor...
Passions.NatureHint: How do you behave under pressure? What is your instinct?
Passions.NaturePlaceholder: e.g., Reckless and bold, Calculating and patient, Compassionate to a fault...
Passions.AllegianceHint: To whom or what are you loyal? What would you sacrifice for?
Passions.AllegiancePlaceholder: e.g., The Church of the Divine Light, My mercenary company, The crown of Aventail...

Finalize.Title: Finalize Your Character
Finalize.Description: Review your character and complete creation.

Errors.SkillRanksRemaining: Please allocate all free skill ranks.

NPCCreation.Title: NPC Creation Wizard
NPCCreation.GMOnly: Only the GM can create NPCs.
NPCCreation.StepIncomplete: Please complete the current step before continuing.

ClassType.Title: Select Class & Type
ClassType.Description: Choose the creature class and specific type for this NPC.

Tier.Title: Select NPC Tier
Tier.Description: Choose the power level of this NPC.

Attributes.Title: Allocate Attributes
Attributes.Description: Distribute attribute points based on class template and tier.

Skills.Title: Configure Skills
Skills.Description: Set skill ranks based on class template and tier limits.

Traits.Title: Select Traits
Traits.Description: Choose traits for this NPC using available trait points.

Errors.ExceedsTraitPoints: Selected traits exceed available trait points.

ClassDesc.humanoid: Intelligent bipedal creatures - humans, elves, orcs, and similar beings.
ClassDesc.beast: Natural animals and creatures - wolves, bears, horses, and similar fauna.
ClassDesc.vermin: Insects, arachnids, and other creeping creatures - spiders, scorpions, beetles.
ClassDesc.afflicted: Cursed or transformed beings - undead, lycanthropes, and corrupted creatures.
ClassDesc.apparition: Spirits, ghosts, and ethereal entities - wraiths, specters, phantoms.
ClassDesc.fiend: Demonic and otherworldly horrors - demons, devils, and eldritch beings.

NPCCreation.ClassTypeDesc: Choose the creature class and specific type for this NPC. Class determines the general category, while Type specifies the exact creature.
NPCCreation.TierDesc: Select the power tier for this NPC. Higher tiers have stronger base dice pools and more trait points to spend.
NPCCreation.AttributesDesc: Distribute attribute points based on the selected tier. Use templates for quick setup or manually adjust values.
NPCCreation.SkillsDesc: Assign skill ranks to this NPC. Use templates for typical builds or manually distribute ranks.
NPCCreation.TraitsDesc: Select traits for this NPC using available trait points. Type-specific traits are highlighted at the top.
NPCCreation.StartOverConfirm: Are you sure you want to start over? All current progress will be lost.

TemplateDesc.Balanced: Even distribution across all attributes. A versatile template suitable for any role.
TemplateDesc.Brute: Focused on Strength and Fortitude. Physically powerful but lacks finesse and mental acuity.
TemplateDesc.Agile: High Agility and Awareness. Quick and perceptive but physically weaker.
TemplateDesc.Cunning: Emphasizes Awareness, Persona, and Ingenuity. Clever and manipulative.
TemplateDesc.Leader: Strong Resolve and Persona. Commands respect and leads others effectively.
TemplateDesc.Caster: Prioritizes Ingenuity, Awareness, and Resolve. Built for spellcasting and magical pursuits.
TemplateDesc.Predator: Strength and Awareness for hunting. A dangerous natural hunter.
TemplateDesc.Prey: Agility and Awareness for survival. Fleet-footed and alert to danger.
TemplateDesc.Tank: Maximum Fortitude and Strength. Tough and hard-hitting but slow.
TemplateDesc.Ambusher: Agility and Awareness for surprise attacks. Strikes from the shadows.
TemplateDesc.Swarm: High Agility, minimal other attributes. Relies on numbers over individual strength.
TemplateDesc.Venomous: Moderate physical stats with some Ingenuity. Relies on toxins rather than brute force.
TemplateDesc.Burrower: Strength and Fortitude for digging. Built for tunneling and ambush.
TemplateDesc.Undead: High Fortitude and Resolve. Tireless and hard to put down permanently.
TemplateDesc.Cursed: Balanced physical attributes with enhanced Resolve. Twisted by dark magic.
TemplateDesc.Vampiric: Balanced with enhanced Persona. Seductive and predatory.
TemplateDesc.Feral: Physical powerhouse. Savage and relentless in pursuit of prey.
TemplateDesc.Ethereal: No physical attributes, high mental stats. Exists between worlds.
TemplateDesc.Vengeful: Some physical presence with strong awareness. Driven by unfinished business.
TemplateDesc.Possessor: Mental attributes only. Seeks to inhabit living hosts.
TemplateDesc.Demonic: Raw physical and mental power. A terror from the depths.
TemplateDesc.Tempter: Maximum Persona with support stats. Corrupts through charm and promises.
TemplateDesc.Minion: Agile and clever but weak. A disposable servant.
TemplateDesc.Corruptor: Mental and social focus. Spreads corruption through influence.

SkillTemplateDesc.Warrior: Combat-focused with Arms, Athletics, Awareness, and Intimidation.
SkillTemplateDesc.Assassin: Stealth and precision with Arms, Stealth, Awareness, and Lethality.
SkillTemplateDesc.Guard: Defensive awareness with Arms, Awareness, Athletics, and Intimidation.
SkillTemplateDesc.Mage: Arcane specialist with Spellcraft, Awareness, Occult, and Resolve.
SkillTemplateDesc.Scout: Reconnaissance with Awareness, Stealth, Athletics, and Survival.
SkillTemplateDesc.Diplomat: Social manipulation with Persuasion, Insight, Deception, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Hunter: Natural predator with Brawling, Athletics, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Stalker: Patient hunter with Stealth, Awareness, and Brawling.
SkillTemplateDesc.Charger: Aggressive assault with Brawling, Athletics, and Intimidation.
SkillTemplateDesc.Swarmer: Pack tactics with Brawling, Stealth, and Athletics.
SkillTemplateDesc.Ambusher: Strike from hiding with Stealth, Brawling, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Parasite: Attach and drain with Stealth, Brawling, and Athletics.
SkillTemplateDesc.Relentless: Tireless pursuit with Brawling, Athletics, Intimidation, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Predator: Apex hunter with Stealth, Brawling, Awareness, and Intimidation.
SkillTemplateDesc.Mastermind: Manipulative schemer with Deception, Persuasion, Awareness, and Occult.
SkillTemplateDesc.Haunter: Terrifying presence with Stealth, Intimidation, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Possessor: Mind invader with Spellcraft, Awareness, Deception, and Resolve.
SkillTemplateDesc.Wailing: Keening terror with Intimidation, Awareness, and Stealth.
SkillTemplateDesc.Destroyer: Unstoppable force with Brawling, Athletics, Intimidation, and Awareness.
SkillTemplateDesc.Corrupter: Soul corrupter with Deception, Persuasion, Awareness, and Spellcraft.
SkillTemplateDesc.Trickster: Mischievous fiend with Deception, Stealth, Awareness, and Athletics.

UITheme.Name: Theme
UITheme.Hint: Choose the visual theme for your interface. Dark theme provides a grimdark aesthetic, while Light theme offers a classic parchment look.

RebuildCompendiums.Name: Rebuild Compendiums
RebuildCompendiums.Label: Rebuild Compendiums
RebuildCompendiums.Hint: Wipe and rebuild all system compendiums from the latest data definitions.
RebuildCompendiums.Title: Rebuild Compendiums
RebuildCompendiums.Warning: This will delete ALL items from ALL system compendiums and replace them with fresh data from the system files.
RebuildCompendiums.Description: Use this to apply updates to skills, backgrounds, equipment, and other compendium data after system updates.
RebuildCompendiums.ConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to wipe and rebuild all compendiums? This cannot be undone.

HeaderControls.NoCharacterArt: This character has no artwork set.
HeaderControls.NoTokenArt: This character has no token artwork set.
